Layla POTD 12/7

December 07, 2010 at 11:17 AM in blog, family

As I mentioned in a previous post, it is getting really cold here in the outskirts of DC! We went from the mid-70s to below freezing in a matter of two weeks. Thanks, old man winter!

To deal with that cold weather we got a warm wrap for Layla's car seat to keep her insulated during her brief trips outside:

Layla's cocoon

Having this thing keeps her extra warm and protected from the biting wind when she's on her way to or from the car. It's a bonus that she likes to play "where's Layla?" with it!

Read and Post Comments

Layla POTD 11/29

November 29, 2010 at 12:07 PM in blog, family

Yesterday we tested out our shopping cart germ-protector-thing in Target. She seemed to love it! It also appears that we are indeed protecting her from germs, because without that thing there she'd be chewing on some disgusting stuff.

Mmmm, shopping cart thing!
